abstracted_objective: Start a sequential code flow, with multiple subtasks performed in turn
Analyze an input to identify, isolate, and characterize its essential components, attributes, and relationships that define its structure and function.
Analyze given inputs or their relationships to identify and assign appropriate categories or classifications based on observed patterns, attributes, or predefined criteria.
Compute a quantitative value by applying a defined computational procedure or functional transformation to one or more input data elements.

Apply one or more defined operations or sequences of operations to an input entity or representation to produce a corresponding output entity or representation, including specifying the necessary conditions or rules to achieve the desired transformation.
Evaluate a collection of elements against defined criteria or conditions and identify, select, or rank those that satisfy the specified requirements.
Combine, adjust, and transform multiple quantitative inputs to produce a unified output measure that satisfies defined conditions or reflects a derived property.
End of current sequential code flow
